transcript:
also half smil- ing as he looked at the handsome girl. 
The German closed his eyes, signifying that he did not understand. 
"Take it if you like," said the officer, giving the girl an apple. 
The girl smiled and took it. Nesvftski like the rest of the men on the bridge did not take his eyes off the women till they had passed. When they had gone by, the same stream of soldiers followed, with the same kind of talk, and at last all stopped. As often happens, the horses of a convoy wagon became res
